Description_lang: When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to $344179u times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by $187881s1%$?s383303[ and increase its damage by $187881s2% or its healing by $187881s3%][].A maximum of $s2 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.
